page.title: 20LITTER BINS START HERE.
page.content: The plastic litter bin that you see in most of our towns and cities today could very well have been produced by Glasdon's at their large factory on Preston New Road in Marton. If you pass the site you will see hundreds of yellow bins neatly stored along with grit-boxes,fibre_glass kiosks and many other items which will eventually decorate our streets,parks and other public places. The company sells its products throughout the country and to many places overseas and this is clearly illustrated by the flags of the various countries that fly outside the factory whenever people from those countries are visiting the factory. The phrase 'Made in Blackpool' isn't only restricted to rock and funny hats!
